sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import DateTimePicker from '../../components/date-time-picker/date-time-picker.component';
import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap';
import FormSelectSearch from '../../components/form-select-search/form-select-search.component';
import { injectIntl } from 'react-intl';
import FormTreeMenu from '../../components/form-tree-menu/form-tree-menu.component';
import PerfectScrollbar from 'react-perfect-scrollbar';
import FormInput from '../../components/form-input/form-input.component';
import { TreeDesign } from './registration.styled';

const SpecFilter = (props) => {
    return (
        <Row>
            <Col md={12}>

               <Col md={12} className="r_treepadding" >
                    <TreeDesign>
                            <PerfectScrollbar>
                                <FormTreeMenu
                                    data={[
                                        {
                                           "key":"root",
                                           "primaryKey":0,
                                           "parentKey":0,
                                           "label":"root",
                                           "item":null,
                                           "nodes":[
                                              {
                                                 "key":"206",
                                                 "primaryKey":206,
                                                 "parentKey":-1,
                                                 "label":"Kedrion S.p.A.",
                                                 "item":{
                                                    "ntemplatemanipulationcode":206,
                                                    "nsampletypecode":0,
                                                    "nproductcatcode":0,
                                                    "nproductcode":0,
                                                    "nformcode":0,
                                                    "ntreeversiontempcode":0,
                                                    "ntemptranstestgroupcode":0,
                                                    "slevelcode":null,
                                                    "sleveldescription":"Kedrion S.p.A.",
                                                    "nparentnode":-1,
                                                    "schildnode":null,
                                                    "nnextchildcode":0,
                                                    "npositioncode":0,
                                                    "nstatus":0,
                                                    "slabelname":null,
                                                    "isreadonly":false,
                                                    "slevelformat":null
                                                 },
                                                 "nodes":[
                                                    {
                                                       "key":"209",
                                                       "primaryKey":209,
                                                       "parentKey":206,
                                                       "label":"Kedrialb - 273M2007 SSA IV",
                                                       "item":{
                                                          "ntemplatemanipulationcode":209,
                                                          "nsampletypecode":0,
                                                          "nproductcatcode":0,
                                                          "nproductcode":0,
                                                          "nformcode":0,
                                                          "ntreeversiontempcode":0,
                                                          "ntemptranstestgroupcode":0,
                                                          "slevelcode":null,
                                                          "sleveldescription":"Kedrialb - 273M2007 SSA IV",
                                                          "nparentnode":206,
                                                          "schildnode":null,
                                                          "nnextchildcode":0,
                                                          "npositioncode":0,
                                                          "nstatus":0,
                                                          "slabelname":null,
                                                          "isreadonly":false,
                                                          "slevelformat":null
                                                       },
                                                       "nodes":[
                                                          {
                                                             "key":"210",
                                                             "primaryKey":210,
                                                             "parentKey":209,
                                                             "label":"50mL",
                                                             "item":{
                                                                "ntemplatemanipulationcode":210,
                                                                "nsampletypecode":0,
                                                                "nproductcatcode":0,
                                                                "nproductcode":0,
                                                                "nformcode":0,
                                                                "ntreeversiontempcode":0,
                                                                "ntemptranstestgroupcode":0,
                                                                "slevelcode":null,
                                                                "sleveldescription":"50mL",
                                                                "nparentnode":209,
                                                                "schildnode":null,
                                                                "nnextchildcode":0,
                                                                "npositioncode":0,
                                                                "nstatus":0,
                                                                "slabelname":null,
                                                                "isreadonly":false,
                                                                "slevelformat":null
                                                             },
                                                             "nodes":null
                                                          }
                                                       ]
                                                    },
                                                    {
                                                       "key":"207",
                                                       "primaryKey":207,
                                                       "parentKey":206,
                                                       "label":"Uman Albumin 250g/L - 021111087",
                                                       "item":{
                                                          "ntemplatemanipulationcode":207,
                                                          "nsampletypecode":0,
                                                          "nproductcatcode":0,
                                                          "nproductcode":0,
                                                          "nformcode":0,
                                                          "ntreeversiontempcode":0,
                                                          "ntemptranstestgroupcode":0,
                                                          "slevelcode":null,
                                                          "sleveldescription":"Uman Albumin 250g/L - 021111087",
                                                          "nparentnode":206,
                                                          "schildnode":null,
                                                          "nnextchildcode":0,
                                                          "npositioncode":0,
                                                          "nstatus":0,
                                                          "slabelname":null,
                                                          "isreadonly":false,
                                                          "slevelformat":null
                                                       },
                                                       "nodes":[
                                                          {
                                                             "key":"208",
                                                             "primaryKey":208,
                                                             "parentKey":207,
                                                             "label":"50mL",
                                                             "item":{
                                                                "ntemplatemanipulationcode":208,
                                                                "nsampletypecode":0,
                                                                "nproductcatcode":0,
                                                                "nproductcode":0,
                                                                "nformcode":0,
                                                                "ntreeversiontempcode":0,
                                                                "ntemptranstestgroupcode":0,
                                                                "slevelcode":null,
                                                                "sleveldescription":"50mL",
                                                                "nparentnode":207,
                                                                "schildnode":null,
                                                                "nnextchildcode":0,
                                                                "npositioncode":0,
                                                                "nstatus":0,
                                                                "slabelname":null,
                                                                "isreadonly":false,
                                                                "slevelformat":null
                                                             },
                                                             "nodes":null
                                                          }
                                                       ]
                                                    }
                                                 ]
                                              }
                                           ]
                                        }
                                     ]}
                                   // handleTreeClick={this.props.onTreeClick}
                                    openNodes={[
                                        "root",
                                        "root/206/207/208",
                                        "root/206/209",
                                        "root/206/209/210",
                                        "root/206",
                                        "root/206/207"
                                     ]}
                                    hasSearch={false}
                                  //  initialOpenNodes={this.props.OpenNodes}
                                    // initialFocusKey={InitialFocusKey}
                                    // initialActiveKey={InitialActiveKey}
                                    focusKey={"root/206/207/208"}
                                    activeKey={"root/206/207/208"}
                                />
                            </PerfectScrollbar>

                    </TreeDesign>
                </Col>
                <Col md={12}>

                    <FormSelectSearch
                        formLabel={"IDS_TESTGROUP" }
                        isSearchable={true}
                        name={"nallottedspeccode"}
                        isDisabled={false}
                        placeholder={"IDS_TESTGROUP" }
                        isMandatory={true}
                        options={[{label:'spec1'},{label:'spec2'}]}
                        alphabeticalSort="true"
                        optionId="nallottedspeccode"
                        optionValue="sspecname"
                        value={{label:'spec1'}}
                        defaultValue={{label:'spec1'}}
                        //  showOption={true}
                        closeMenuOnSelect={true}
                        onChange={(event) => this.props.onspecChange(event, ['nallottedspeccode', 'sversionno'])}>
                    </FormSelectSearch>
                </Col>
                <Col md={12}>
                    <FormInput
                        label={"IDS_VERSION" }
                        name="sversion"
                        type="text"
                        maxLength="100"
                        value={ 1}
                        placeholder={ "IDS_VERSION" }
                        isDisabled={true}
                    />
                </Col>


            </Col>
        </Row>
    );
}
export default injectIntl(SpecFilter);
